mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UserProfile ( profile_gender, profile_age, profile_region, profile_weight, profile_height, profile_goal, profile_allergy, profile_sport1, profile_workout_frequency, profile_sport2, profile_sport3, member_id ) VALUES ( #{profile_gender}, #{profile_age}, #{profile_region}, #{profile_weight}, #{profile_height}, #{profile_goal}, #{profile_allergy}, #{profile_sport1}, #{profile_workout_frequency}, #{profile_sport2}, #{profile_sport3}, #{member_id} );
